question: If you play [Networking](https://netrunnerdb.com/en/card/31020) and choose to add it to your grip, do you draw 1 card with [Aniccam](https://netrunnerdb.com/en/card/26084)?
answer: No, [Networking](https://netrunnerdb.com/en/card/31020) adding itself to HQ prevents the default trashing of a resolved event.
